    Chat Class

    Extends Emitter

    onAny

    (
    • callback
    )

    Inherited from RootEmitter: src/index.js:62

    Listen for any event on this object and fire a callback when it's emitted

    Parameters:

    • callback Function

      The function to run when any event is emitted. First parameter is the event name and second is the payload.

    (
    • location
    • event
    • first
    • last
    )
    private

    Defined in src/index.js:467

    Parameters:

    • location String

      Where in the middleeware the event should run (send, broadcast)

    • event String

      The event name

    • first String

      The first function to run before the plugins have run

    • last String

      The last function to run after the plugins have run

    (
    • event
    • data
    )

    Defined in src/index.js:244

    Send events to other clients in this User. Events are broadcast over the network and all events are made on behalf of Me

    Properties

    channel

    String

    Defined in src/index.js:157

    The channel name for this Chat

    users

    Object

    Defined in src/index.js:165

    A list of users in this Chat. Automatically kept in sync, Use Chat.on('$ocf.join') and related events to get notified when this changes

    Events

    $ocf.disconnect

    Defined in src/index.js:447

    A User has been disconnected from the Chat

    Event Payload:

    • User Object

      The User that disconnected

    $ocf.join

    Defined in src/index.js:191

    Broadcast that a User has joined the room

    Event Payload:

    • payload.user Object

      The User that came online

    $ocf.offline

    Defined in src/index.js:455

    A User has gone offline

    Event Payload:

    • User Object

      The User that has gone offline

    $ocf.online

    Defined in src/index.js:335

    Broadcast that a User has come online

    Event Payload:

    • payload.user Object

      The User that came online

    $ocf.state

    Defined in src/index.js:377

    Broadcast that a User has changed state

    Event Payload:

    • payload.user Object

      The User that changed state

    • payload.state Object

      The new user state for this Chat
